channel.title: Problem with starter

item.title: Problem with starter
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

OK so im using defaultscape so that i wont have to mess around with alot of stuff. But i tried to add a starter, the command works perfectly. The starter i added give the right items, the right amount, and all that i want it to. The only thing that is wrong with it is that all i have to do to get another starter is log off and then do the command again.

Here is the code im using

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(392, 1500);
addItem(6528, 1);
addItem(554, 2000);
addItem(555, 2000);
addItem(565, 2000);
addItem(556, 2000);
addItem(557, 2000);
addItem(560, 2000);
addItem(561, 2000);
addItem(562, 2000);
addItem(563, 2000);
addItem(566, 2000);
addItem(558, 2000);
sendMessage(“Totalpkscape Starter Package”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry " + playerName + “, but…”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " needs to be kicked for trying to get an extra starter :p”);

        }
    }[/code]

so if there is anything you think might be wrong please just post it

Read full topic
